modName: Alternate Dragonplate Armour - requested by LordAvernus
summary:
Made for a request by LordAvernus.

An alternate Dragonplate Armour with additional plating on the biceps and fully covered arms and legs in a padded material.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE at 5 July 2012: Female arms don\'t clip, 1st person arms now show proper.

Made for a request by LordAvernus.

A few simple adjustments to the original Dragonplate Armour, to give it an alternate look. This adds additional plating on the biceps and fully covers both arms and legs in a padded material.

Simply put the files in the .rar into your Skyrim/data folder.

ARTISTIC DISCLAIMER: The item contained within has been tailored to the desires of the requester, with components provided by or appointed by the requester. The appearance of this item does NOT mirror my artistic preference of style and artistic skills by default.
author: Sara
